import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
import java.math.BigInteger;

class S{

    public static void main(String[] args) {
        Scanner in = new Scanner(System.in);
    int t=in.nextInt();
    in.nextLine();
   while(t-->0){
     BigInteger num=new BigInteger(in.nextLine(),2);
    BigInteger n= BigInteger.valueOf(in.nextLong());
     in.nextLine();
    BigInteger s=num.add(n);
    System.out.println(s.toString(2));
  }
 }
}
